recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 
2. In a large skillet, cook bacon until crispy. Remove bacon from skillet and crumble. 
3. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese. 
4. Drain spaghetti and add to skillet with bacon grease. Toss to coat. 
5. Remove skillet from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture. 
6. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick and easy stir-fry with chicken and vegetables
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, etc.)
recipes.instructions:
1. In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce and sesame oil. Set aside. 
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. 
3. Add garlic and onion to skillet and cook until softened. 
4. Add chicken to skillet and cook until browned and cooked through. 
5. Add mixed vegetables to skillet and cook until tender-crisp. 
6. Stir in soy sauce mixture and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. 
7. Serve hot over cooked rice.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple and refreshing salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
recipes.instructions:
1. Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate, alternating and overlapping. 
2. Scatter fresh basil leaves over the top. 
3. Drizzle balsamic vinegar and olive oil over the salad. 
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
5. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: Classic comfort food with melted cheese between slices of bread
recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat a skillet over medium heat. 
2. Butter one side of each slice of bread. 
3. Place one slice of bread, butter side down, in the skillet. 
4. Top with cheese slices and the other slice of bread, butter side up. 
5. Cook until bread is golden brown and cheese is melted, about 3-4 minutes per side. 
6. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh and colorful salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese
recipes.instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese. 
2. In a small bowl, whisk together red wine vinegar, olive oil, oregano, salt, and pepper. 
3. Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to coat. 
4. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Healthy and delicious toast with mashed avocado
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut avocado in half, remove pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl. 
2. Mash avocado with a fork until smooth. 
3. Stir in lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 
4. Spread mashed avocado evenly onto toasted bread slices. 
5. Sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired. 
6. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: Hearty and comforting soup with a variety of vegetables
recipes.instructions:
1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. 
2. Add onion and garlic to pot and cook until softened. 
3. Add carrots, celery, zucchini, and yellow squash to pot and cook for 5 minutes. 
4. Stir in vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, and dried thyme. 
5. Bring soup to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes. 
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
7. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
recipes.description: Creamy and nutritious smoothie with peanut butter and banana
recipes.instructions:
1. Peel bananas and place in a blender. 
2. Add peanut butter, milk, Greek yogurt, and honey to blender. 
3. Add a handful of ice cubes. 
4. Blend until smooth and creamy. 
5. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Omelette
recipes.description: Fluffy and customizable omelette made with eggs
ingredients: Fillings of your choice (cheese, vegetables, ham, etc.)
recipes.instructions:
1. In a small bowl, beat eggs with milk until well combined. Season with salt and pepper. 
2. Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat. 
3. Pour egg mixture into skillet and cook until edges begin to set. 
4. Using a spatula, gently lift edges of omelette and tilt skillet to allow uncooked egg to flow underneath. 
5. Once top is mostly set, add fillings of your choice to one half of the omelette. 
6. Fold other half of omelette over fillings and cook for another minute or until cheese is melted (if using). 
7. Slide omelette onto a plate and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic homemade cookies loaded with chocolate chips
recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and line baking sheets with parchment paper. 
2. In a large bowl, cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 
3. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract. 
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients and mix until just combined. 
5. Fold in chocolate chips. 
6. Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto prepared baking sheets. 
7. Bake for 9-11 minutes or until edges are golden brown. 
8. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
